= Details =

*Descriptions coming soon .. maybe*

The current version of the application supports the following image modifications:
  * Folder conversion from .jpg to .png
  * Contrast Stretching
  * Gamma Correction
  * Histogram Equalization
  * Averaging Filter
  * Median Filter
  * Laplacian Filter
  * Sobel Filter
  * Highboost Filter
  * Global Thresholding
  * Iterative Thresholding
  * Otsu Thresholding
